lead_paragraph: Today's idea: Never has so much money poured into scientific research, yet the results add up to surprisingly little, an essay says. With life infinitely harder to fathom than matter, have we finally come to science's dead end?
snippet: Wednesday | Today's idea: Never has so much money poured into scientific research, yet the results add up to surprisingly little, an essay says. With life infinitely harder to fathom than matter, have we finally come to science's dead end? [Prospect]
